verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God of Abraham,
God of covenant
and of faithful promises

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Time and time again
You have proven
You’ll do just what you said

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Though the storms may come
and the winds may blow
I’ll remain steadfast

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And let my heart learn
when you speak a word
it will come to pass

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Great is your faithfulness to me
Great is your faithfulness to me

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
From the rising sun
to the setting same
I will praise your name

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: Great is your faithfulness to me

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
God from age to age,
though the earth may pass away
Your word remains the same

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Your history can prove
there’s nothing You can’t do
You’re faithful and True

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Though the storms may come
and the winds may blow
I’ll remain steadfast

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
And let my heart learn
when you speak a word
it will come to pass

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I put my faith in Jesus
My anchor to the ground
My hope and firm foundation
He’ll never let me down
